title: Drawing, "Sketches.  Landscapes.  Jamica, West Indies", July 1865
medium: Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457e
inscribed: Verso:  Inscribed vertically in graphite, at left: Jamaica
description: Horizontal view of the sun bursting from behind clouds on to mountain ranges, with a wooded mountain side in the left foreground and a valley stretching obliquely backwards in the right foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches.  Landscapes.  Jamica, West Indies", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite on cream-colored heavy wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-10-c.
